Posts.Content: Jan 31, 2008 06:06PM - edited Jan 31, 2008 06:32PM by BJG I have had xeloda in combination with taxotere also since September. The cancer was also in my lungs from the first diagnosis. Will be having another cat/scan February 13th . Hugs          Betty
Posts.Title: Xeloda BJG LoriFL

Posts.Content: BJG wrote: I have had Stage 4 inoperatable breast cancer since February 2007 life threatening and 12 IV chemos metastic and taking Xeloda since September doing very well. Did have problems with hand and feet peeling, loosing toe nails and mouth and throat problems but Onc. reduced Xeloda three different times and now having no problems. Log in to post a reply
